snackbarError: Unfortunately an error occured. Please try again later.
guideValues: * All of the above are guide values
manualRelubricationQuantityIntervalToolt:
For reasons of operational safety, relubrication periods > 1 year are not recommended.

It is recommended – especially for large manual relubrication quantities – to distribute the relubrication quantity on several lubricating processes over the relubrication period.
automaticRelubricationQuantityPerDayTool: Lubricating grease quantity per time for automatic relubrication.
additiveRequiredTooltip: Assessment for the prevailing operating conditions (load and viscosity ratio kappa), see also FAQ.
lowerTemperatureLimitTooltip: Lower limit for the temperature at the start of motion for the bearing, see also FAQs.
upperTemperatureLimitTooltip: An operation beyond this temperature leads to a very short grease operating life, FAQs.
H1Registration: H1 registration (NSF-H1 kosher and halal certification)
